__e: I meet Ray in Egypt, and he comes from 'round the corner.
All those people in Egypt and God knows where else.
- Doesn't mean a thing. Except that we liked Egypt and we were there before.
And there's a real... there's a real mystery here. Who built this place?
I'll go one better. I'll settle all your debts so that you will be free of the sordid worry of the soldiers' pay. In return, you'll give me control for 3 years of your 3 properties in Lower Egypt.
You hold Egypt in your hand, my brother.
